turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. Alright. I would like to place an order from Starbucks on 1881 cyver ave in Lake City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, could you repeat the address of that starbucks for me please?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Kiowa Ave, Lake Havasu City, Arizona 86403.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you didn't want sugar or milk in that, right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want that iced or hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: cool. anything else for your order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you want to order a grande black coffee from starbucks on 1881 kiyowa ave in arizona.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, should i place the order now? the total will be $2.00.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've ordered your drink for you at starbucks on 1881 kiyowa ave in arizona.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and it should be ready for pick up in 4 minutes. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message shortly.
